page.title: 10Employment & Industry
page.content: Compared with many other places in West Cumbria, employment in Silloth is good except among young people, as not many firms take on school leavers. Out of 70 students only 8 gained jobs this summer. There are about 2750 people in Silloth and the official unemployment figure is about{10 -12 per cent. There are three main areas for employment: the old aerodrome site, Carr's Mill and dock area,and tourism. The three main factories on the former aerodrome site are{Yates', M.A.S.,}and {Cheri-foam Ltd. }Yates' is a big new factory built about 5 years ago for making copper foil, some of which is used by M.A.S. The latter make circuit boards from the foil and laminates. Cheri-foam produces foam-rubber of all kinds and shapes. It is mainly used for all kinds of seating. {Cont'd.
